mapper.sql: select p.requirement_id, p.project_name, p.contract_number, p.client, p.project_leader, p.project_leader_job_number, p.project_members, p.support_unit, p.support_unit_number, p.project_category, p.project_type, p.project_classification, p.project_nature, p.service_national_economy, p.national_economy_sub_industry, p.socio_economic_objective, p.start_project_time, p.end_project_time, p.total_budget, p.contract_type, p.first_discipline, p.secondary_discipline, p.project_leader_unit, p.enterprise_number, p.campus_member_account, p.requirement_status, p.creat_by, p.create_time, p.update_by, p.update_time, p.requirement_keywords, p.requirement_description, p.requirement_release_time, kyfz_enterprise.enterprise_name, kyfz_enterprise.enterprise_describe, kyfz_enterprise.registered_capital, kyfz_enterprise.enterprise_Keywords from kyfz_requirement p LEFT JOIN kyfz_enterprise ON p.enterprise_number = kyfz_enterprise.enterprise_id left join sys_user u on p.user_id=u.user_id left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id=u.dept_id
mapper.insert:
SELECT (MAX(requirement_id) + 1) AS requirementId FROM kyfz_requirement
insert into kyfz_requirement
requirement_id, project_name,
contract_number, client,
project_leader, project_leader_job_number, project_members,
support_unit, support_unit_number, project_category,
project_type, project_classification, project_nature, service_national_economy, national_economy_sub_industry, socio_economic_objective, start_project_time, end_project_time,
total_budget, contract_type, first_discipline, secondary_discipline, project_leader_unit, enterprise_number, campus_member_account, requirement_status,
creat_by, create_time, update_by, user_id, update_time, requirement_keywords, requirement_description, requirement_release_time
#{requirementId}, #{projectName},
#{contractNumber}, #{client}, #{projectLeader}, #{projectLeaderJobNumber}, #{projectMembers},
#{supportUnit}, #{supportUnitNumber}, #{projectCategory}, #{projectType}, #{projectClassification}, #{projectNature}, #{serviceNationalEconomy}, #{nationalEconomySubIndustry}, #{socioEconomicObjective}, #{startProjectTime}, #{endProjectTime},
#{totalBudget}, #{contractType}, #{firstDiscipline}, #{secondaryDiscipline}, #{projectLeaderUnit}, #{enterpriseNumber}, #{campusMemberAccount}, #{requirementStatus}, #{creatBy}, sysdate(),
#{updateBy}, #{userId},
#{updateTime}, #{requirementKeywords}, #{requirementDescription}, sysdate()
mapper.update:
update kyfz_requirement
project_name = #{projectName}, contract_number = #{contractNumber}, client = #{client}, project_leader = #{projectLeader}, project_leader_job_number = #{projectLeaderJobNumber}, project_members = #{projectMembers}, support_unit = #{supportUnit}, support_unit_number = #{supportUnitNumber}, project_category = #{projectCategory}, project_type = #{projectType}, project_classification = #{projectClassification}, project_nature = #{projectNature}, service_national_economy = #{serviceNationalEconomy}, national_economy_sub_industry = #{nationalEconomySubIndustry}, socio_economic_objective = #{socioEconomicObjective}, start_project_time = #{startProjectTime}, end_project_time = #{endProjectTime}, total_budget = #{totalBudget}, contract_type = #{contractType}, first_discipline = #{firstDiscipline}, secondary_discipline = #{secondaryDiscipline}, project_leader_unit = #{projectLeaderUnit}, enterprise_number = #{enterpriseNumber}, campus_member_account = #{campusMemberAccount}, requirement_status = #{requirementStatus}, creat_by = #{creatBy}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime}, requirement_keywords = #{requirementKeywords}, requirement_description = #{requirementDescription}, requirement_release_time = #{requirementReleaseTime}, where requirement_id = #{requirementId}

insert into kyfz_staging_requirement

total_budget, contract_type, first_discipline, secondary_discipline, project_leader_unit, enterprise_number, campus_member_account, requirement_status,
creat_by, create_time, update_by, user_id, update_time, requirement_keywords, requirement_description, task_id, requirement_release_time

update kyfz_staging_requirement
project_name = #{projectName}, contract_number = #{contractNumber}, client = #{client}, project_leader = #{projectLeader}, project_leader_job_number = #{projectLeaderJobNumber}, project_members = #{projectMembers}, support_unit = #{supportUnit}, support_unit_number = #{supportUnitNumber}, project_category = #{projectCategory}, project_type = #{projectType}, project_classification = #{projectClassification}, project_nature = #{projectNature}, service_national_economy = #{serviceNationalEconomy}, national_economy_sub_industry = #{nationalEconomySubIndustry}, socio_economic_objective = #{socioEconomicObjective}, start_project_time = #{startProjectTime}, end_project_time = #{endProjectTime}, total_budget = #{totalBudget}, contract_type = #{contractType}, first_discipline = #{firstDiscipline}, secondary_discipline = #{secondaryDiscipline}, project_leader_unit = #{projectLeaderUnit}, enterprise_number = #{enterpriseNumber}, campus_member_account = #{campusMemberAccount}, requirement_status = #{requirementStatus}, creat_by = #{creatBy}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime}, requirement_keywords = #{requirementKeywords}, requirement_description = #{requirementDescription}, requirement_release_time = #{requirementReleaseTime}, where requirement_id = #{requirementId}
mapper.select: select p.requirement_id, p.project_name, p.contract_number, p.client, p.project_leader, p.project_leader_job_number, p.project_members, p.support_unit, p.support_unit_number, p.project_category, p.project_type, p.project_classification, p.project_nature, p.service_national_economy, p.national_economy_sub_industry, p.socio_economic_objective, p.start_project_time, p.end_project_time, p.total_budget, p.contract_type, p.first_discipline, p.secondary_discipline, p.project_leader_unit, p.enterprise_number, p.campus_member_account, p.requirement_status, p.creat_by, p.create_time, p.update_by, p.update_time, p.requirement_keywords, p.requirement_description, p.requirement_release_time, kyfz_enterprise.enterprise_name, kyfz_enterprise.enterprise_describe, kyfz_enterprise.registered_capital, kyfz_enterprise.enterprise_Keywords from kyfz_staging_requirement p LEFT JOIN kyfz_enterprise ON p.enterprise_number = kyfz_enterprise.enterprise_id left join sys_user u on p.user_id=u.user_id left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id=u.dept_id where requirement_id = #{requirementId}
